titleStmt.title: The Charterhouse with the last vvill and testament of Thomas Sutton Esquire. Taken out of the Prerogatiue Court, according to the true originall.
titleStmt.author: Sutton, Thomas, 1532-1611. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by George Eld] for Thomas Thorp,

notesStmt.note: "The last vvill and testament. of Thomas Sutton Esquire" has separate divisional title and pagination; register is continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
